## Introduction


- $PAF$ - Population Attributable Fraction
- $RR$ - Relative Risk
- $P_e$ - proportion of the popualtion exposed
  
- PAF Formula: 
\[
PAF = \frac{P_e(RR-1)}{P_e(RR-1)+1}
\]
